creator: juan.rivera@citrix.com
text:
I configured Apache 2.0.43 as a reverse proxy using name based vhosts. I have a 
vhost as a regular web site too.

When I hit Apache to view the regular web site, no memory increase in the child 
process.

But when I hit vhost configure with mod_proxy, every hit increases the memory 
consumption by 40-60Kbs.

The configuration is pretty standard, nothing real fancy, just plain reverse 
proxy configuration.
Is this problem still happening in the latest v2.0.46-dev?
creator: minfrin@sharp.fm
